other_tests.changes_over_time: Finger sticks with home glucose monitoring ranged from 113 to 200 mg/dL (6.27-11.10 mmol/L); HbA1C fluctuated, initially at 8.5%, later ranged from 6.9% to 8.0%.

other_tests.date: Before starting Metformin (21 months after diagnosis)
other_tests.changes_over_time: After starting Metformin, HbA1C improved to 7.5% but later rose to 7.8% before adding Rosiglitazone.

other_tests.date: Six months after addition of Rosiglitazone
other_tests.changes_over_time: Although HbA1C improved, control had deteriorated over time prompting an increase in Rosiglitazone dose.
All subsequent measurements have been in the 2.6 to 20.0 range.
